20110130032715.000|20110130032717.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20110130032717.000|20110130032719.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110130032719.000|20110130032721.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110130032721.000|20110130032721.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110130032721.000|20110130032724.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110130032724.000|20110130032724.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110130032724.000|20110130032727.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110130032727.000|20110130032727.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110130032727.000|20110130032730.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110130032730.000|20110130032730.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110130032730.000|20110130032730.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110130032730.000|20110130032733.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110130032733.000|20110130032733.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110130032733.000|20110130032735.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110130032735.000|20110130032735.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110130032735.000|20110130032738.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110130032738.000|20110130032738.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110130032738.000|20110130032741.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110130032741.000|20110130032741.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110130032741.000|20110130032742.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110130032742.000|20110130032742.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110130032742.000|20110130032745.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110130032745.000|20110130032745.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110130032745.000|20110130032747.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110130032747.000|20110130032747.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110130032747.000|20110130032750.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110130032750.000|20110130032750.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110130032750.000|20110130032752.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110130032752.000|20110130032752.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110130032752.000|20110130032755.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110130032755.000|20110130032756.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110130032756.000|20110130032756.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110130032756.000|20110130032758.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110130032758.000|20110130032758.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110130032758.000|20110130032801.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,

20110130032801.000|20110130032803.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.
